summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Thrryv fact-checking platform. All core features tested successfully including user authentication, claim creation with domains/confidence levels, annotation system (support/contradict/context), truth labels, credibility scoring, and user reputation system.
passed_tests: Create claims with domain and confidence level
View claims feed with proper display
Claim detail page with truth labels and credibility scores
Add annotations (support, contradict, context) to claims
Truth label calculation based on annotations
User reputation system and profile pages
Media upload functionality (with mocked AI detection)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all user flows and UI components working)
